articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Chinese scientists use stem cell technology to grow antlers on MICE - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists from Northwestern Polytechnical University in Xi'an, China have grown antler-like structures on the foreheads of mice by transplanting stem cells from deer.
articles.content:
Scientists have managed to grow antler-like structures on the foreheads of mice by transplanting stem cells from deer.
Deer antlers fall off and regrow each year during the spring they'll increase i… [+4928 chars]
